page.title: Merrill Profit Falls, Global Markets Down
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Merrill Lynch Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MER.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MER.N</A> on Tuesday said third-quarter profit fell 8 percent, hurt by reduced trading in debt and equity markets.
